Salt & Stone Squalane Facial Cream

Brand: Salt & Stone

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Water (Aqua), Glycerin, Nannochloropsis Oculata (Algae) Extract, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Macadamia (Nut) Ternifolia Seed Oil, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil*, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil*, Squalane (Plant-Based), Cetearyl Olivate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Sorbitan Olivate, Magnesium Aluminum Silicate, Hyaluronic Acid, Aloe

Gratissima (Avocado) Oil*, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil*, Squalane (Plant-Based), Cetearyl Olivate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Sorbitan Olivate, Magnesium Aluminum Silicate, Hyaluronic Acid, Aloe BarbadensisLeaf Juice, Cetearyl Glucoside, Glyceryl Stearate, Camellia Sinensis (Green Tea) Leaf Extract, Algae (Seaweed) Extract, Butyrospermum Parkii

Aluminum Silicate, Hyaluronic Acid, Aloe BarbadensisLeaf Juice, Cetearyl Glucoside, Glyceryl Stearate, Camellia Sinensis (Green Tea) Leaf Extract, Algae (Seaweed) Extract, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter Extract, Sodium Benzoate, Sodium Levulinate, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate, Tocopherol, Xanthan Gum, Calendula Officinalis (Marigold)

Xanthan Gum, Calendula Officinalis (Marigold) Flower Extract*, Citric Acid, Chamomilla Recutita Flower Extract*, Arthrospira Platensis Extract, Polyquaternium-24, Citrus Grandis (Pomelo Grapefruit) Seed Oil, Geranium Maculatum Essential Oil, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil, Hydrolyzed Corallina Officinalis Extract.
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
